participant_1.background:
I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
my daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class.
I got married in a park to celebrate my love of nature.
My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother.
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.

participant_2.background:
I will teach my children to appreciate good music and be tolerant of others' tastes.
I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
I love watermelon because it's sweet and refreshing.
i am a night owl , but i am an introvert so i do not go out much or anything.
My most difficult job was cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line.

content.text: What are some of your interests?
I love music and watermelon. I am an introvert so I don't go out much, but I love to dance in my room to my favorite music.
I love Katy Perry's music. She's one of my favorites. I also love sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
I love Katy Perry too! My daughter loves her music too. We went to see her in concert last year. It was a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts. I'm glad you and your daughter had a good time.
Thanks, we did. What's your favorite Katy Perry song?
I love so many of her songs, but I think my favorite is "Firework."
That's a great song! I love the message behind it.
Me too. It's a great song to dance to.
It is. I think I'm going to go dance to it right now.
Have fun! I'm going to go listen to some more of her music.
